detail_desc: Trousers in woven fabric in a relaxed fit with two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with turn-ups and covered buttons at the hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Shorts in patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Double-layered jersey hat with a small appliqué at the hem.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in cotton jersey. High waist with wide, covered elastication.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Small embroidered detail at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative, twisted cord bow and tassels.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Fitted jersey dress with long, straight sleeves. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. The scarf is made partly from recycled polyester. Size 52x190 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Short dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Trousers in a soft viscose weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 60 cm, circumference 180 cm.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight, wide legs. Brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in imitation leather with a zip down the front and small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a zip at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the sides of the hem. Lined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Wide blouse in a soft weave with gathered details, a stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, raglan, balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, seam with a drawstring at the waist and a slit centre front. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, small print at the bottom and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hipster briefs in soft modal jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved hooded top and pair of leggings in printed jersey made from a cotton blend. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood with a wrapover front, ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft wool rib knit with a round neck and long sleeves.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent nylon. Hood with a drawstring at the front, drip-free peak and an elasticated drawstring at the back to allow it to fit comfortably and snugly on the head. High collar, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a yoke front and back. Chest pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs, and an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Covered elastication at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem that can be adjusted at the sides.

Ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a concealed drawstring waist with a concealed key pocket, legs with ventilating mesh sections and a zip at the hems. The tights are made partly from recycled polyester.

Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a lined hood and zip at the top that continues along the edges of the hood. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Dungaree shorts in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with adjustable straps, pockets and press-studs at the sides, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Soft denim jacket in superstretch, washed and flexible denim for maximum mobility. Collar, a frill-trimmed yoke front and back and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist, contrasting colour stripes down the sides, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Jacket in soft, fast-drying thermal fleece with a high collar, concealed zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck that has a small opening and decorative knot at the front. Smocked seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, slightly lower crotch, zipped side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short jumper in a hole-patterned wool and cashmere blend with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Asymmetric hem with fringes.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cool cotton weave with piped trims. Boxy-style shirt with small notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with an intarsia motif on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated puff sleeves, and a frill trim at the hem.
Fine-knit socks with scalloped edges at the top. The cotton content of the socks is organic. The polyester content is recycled.
Short, high-waisted skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a drawstring down the front and flounce at the hem. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Unlined.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.
Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Textured top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Twisted seams at the front and short slits in the sides.

V-neck dress in an airy weave with buttons at the top, a seam at the waist with a small frill trim and a gathered, softly draping skirt. Long, slightly wider sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing on the sleeves and hem. Rounded hem.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Earrings with long, pointed metal studs decorated with small sparkly stones. Length 4 cm.
Dress in soft cotton twill with embroidery on the front, a collar, button placket, and sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless lace halterneck top with narrow shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the back and fasten with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Jersey lining at the front.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in a soft knit. Hat in a textured knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and a ribbed hem. Fleece lining. Twisted, rib-knit tube scarf.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Longer, fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short jersey dress with short sleeves and a bell-shaped skirt.
Metal earrings with a round disc at the top and pearly plastic pendants. Length 8.7 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, pleated top in jersey with a slight sheen. Round neck and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.

Bandeau bikini top with a knot detail at the front, lined, lightly padded cups and side support. Detachable, adjustable straps that fasten at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with lace. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back.
